Rule.NonCompliantComment: The IPv6 configuration status has not been verified, potentially leaving unmanaged network exposure.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Review and document the IPv6 configuration by running "ip -6 addr show". This is a manual audit.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: Wireless interfaces are enabled, which increases the risk of unauthorized wireless access.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable wireless interfaces by using "rfkill block all" or unloading wireless drivers.
Rule.Verification: rfkill list | grep -E "Wireless" | grep -q "Soft blocked: yes" && echo 0 || echo 1

Rule.NonCompliantComment: The Bluetooth service is enabled, which may expose the system to unauthorized access via wireless connections.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable and stop the Bluetooth service if it is not required.
Rule.Correction: systemctl disable bluetooth; systemctl stop bluetooth
Rule.Verification: systemctl is-active bluetooth | grep -q "inactive" && echo 0 || echo 1
